item.description:
Hear Beethoven's Ninth Symphony at Tanglewood, Sunday August 24th at 2:30 pm. Guest conductor Christoph von Dohn√°nyi leads the Boston Symphony Orchestra, Tanglewood Festival Chorus and soloists in Beethoven's Ninth Symphony. (August 24)

Hi Hi -

If possible let's meet between 12:30 and 1:00 by the ticket booths. I will have blueballoons and you can call my cell phone - 617-780-0429. We can find out if people want to sit onthe lawn $19 (bring blankets) or under the shelter $28.

Carpooling : Please write the drivers closest to your area.

Chris can take 3 (Roslindale)
Tom can take 4 or 5 max from West Roxbury.
Roberta and Bill have full cars.
I can take 3 if leaving on Saturday and staying overnight (flying in Friday so want to break up the drive)


For meals if you want to pre-order a box lunch, see the Meals-To-Go page at tanglewood.org; http://www.bso.org/bs...
If the link doesn't work, you can browse to it from tanglewood.org: "Dining at Tanglewood" (left side), scroll to the Meals-To-Go Menu (about 2/3 down the page) and select the specific performance and the type of meal you want (prices range from $19.95 for a "bag lunch" for one, to $103 for a classy lunch with wine for two; Then click "select food option" at the bottom, and you can enter the quantity and the specific selection (e.g. "flavor" of sandwich) and complete your purchase online. I believe they have to be ordered at least 48 hours in advance.

Take care, Susan

-----
Previous comments:

Please write in and say if you could drive (I think every rider could contribute $5 for gas - does that sound fine?) A couple people I've met don't have cars, so those who do, please say so when you have time. Best, Susan
item.how_to_find_us: Will have blue balloons again (that float this time) near ticket booths.
item.name: Beethoven's 9th at Tanglewood on the Lawn
